transcript:
Customer: Oh, taiyaari da soch hundi aari vich feed di par saddi aari jive road concrete bore kiha da pawa ke tel chak layiye bhi.

Hello

Hello

Hello
Executive: Ujjwal ji se baat kar rahe hain? Navratan Mangal bol raha hu.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ah, Ujjwal ji, Bharat baat kar raha hu IndiaMART head office se baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Kahan se?
Executive: Sir, IndiaMART se baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Actually sir aapka call pending tha ek sir wo hum aapko guide karenge na sir IndiaMART kaise use karna hai sir live karenge sir. Sir regarding wo aap se connect kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Accha.
Executive: Thoda sa aapke paas time hai main paanch das minute ka time aap se lena chahunga aapko video call pe leke samjhana tha sir kaise use hota hai IndiaMART.
Customer: Hmm?
Executive: Haan ji?
Customer: Kya cheez?
Executive: Sir bol raha hu ek video call pending hai sir jahan pe aapki service hum live karenge aapko guide karenge sir kaise isko use karna hai.
Customer: Arey sir, pata nahi.
Executive: Accha.
Executive: Aur aapka ek call bhi aaya tha hamare paas sir Munish Kumar se baat kar miss call bhi dikha raha tha sir. Ek concern bhi raise ho gaya tha.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To abhi connect kar sakte hain sir paanch minute ke liye?
Customer: Video call?
Executive: Haan mobile phone se aap join kar lijiyega sir kyunki guide karna hai aapko sir kaise use karna hai IndiaMART.
Customer: Aisa abhi to mere paas thoda time nahi tha main ek jagah baitha hu abhi.
Executive: Accha. Sir bataiye kab aap bataiye sir?
Customer: Aap to mere se karna 4 baje kar.
Executive: Sir kal bhi aapne 6 baje bola tha fir sir baat ho nahi payi thi aap se aap sir busy ho gaye the.
Customer: Aisa is time to ek kaam ka time hota hai na bhaiya.
Executive: Nahi koi baat nahi sir 4 baje daal lenge koi dikkat nahi 4 baje aap free rahenge na sir. 4 baje ek baar discuss kar lete hain hai na. Baki aapka concern aaya tha aapka koi concern to nahi hai kyunki aapka yahan pe miss call show kar raha tha IndiaMART se sir. Koi aur aapka feedback concern to nahi hai sir IndiaMART se?
Customer: IndiaMART se.
Executive: Hello. Haan main yahi keh raha tha ke isme leads jo hain wo thodi kam aa rahi hain.
Executive: To uske liye to bol raha hu sir wo connect karne ke liye to main aap se call kar raha hu sir. Catalog sahi karne ke liye aapko guide karne ke liye sir.
Customer: To fir ek kaam karo 4 baje kareeb karo mere paas.
Executive: 4 baje kar lenge. Theek hai? Ji. 4 baje phone kar lete hain ek baar thoda sa time nikal lijiyega sir.
Customer: Ji ji. Baki ye feedback main aapka close kar raha hu aapke mail pe ek feedback aayega sir. Aapka jo registered mail hai na sir usme aap kindly apna feedback check kar lijiyega.
Customer: Accha ji.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Aur idhar ye maan ke chalo koi bhi leads convert nahi ho pa rahi order mein.
Executive: Sir abhi time hi kitna hua sir aapko IndiaMART use karte hue? 4 paanch teen chaar din hue hain shayad hardly.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan na. To conversion ka to kya hai sir aap samajhiye sir hum aapko hafte ke 17 customer dete hain aap samajhiye sir. 17 mein se aap jab 17 se baat karenge na sir. To aapko khud dikhega sir chaar follow up pe aayenge sir do aapke liye aage wale customer banenge sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Hum isiliye aapko 17 leads dete hain sir. Humko pata hai sir saari leads convert hone wali nahi hoti hain sir. Kahin pe price ka issue aayega location ka aayega sir.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Theek hai sir. Thoda sa time dijiye. Main aapko guide kar raha tha ye concern main aapka close kar du koi agar feedback aapke paas nahi hai uske alawa to?
Customer: Mujhe 4 baje karo aap mujhe call.
Executive: Haan ji kya bol rahe hain?
Customer: Ye keh raha hu 4 baje karo aap mujhe call.
Executive: Chaliye main 4 baje karta hu theek hai.
Customer: Hmm. Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving fewer leads.

- No leads are converting into orders.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video call for guidance.

- Agreed to schedule a call at 4:00 PM.

- Executive will close the feedback.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer at 4:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, video call, catalog, feedback
